Name: Ultimagus
About the game: A magical 2-d shooter/defender. You play as a magus with a wide range of spells to unlock. Your goal is to not let any bad guys pass by using any magical means necessary. Take the challenge; Face countless hordes of monsters; defeat the evil bosses; rank up and become Ultimagus! Features include: 20 unique spells Magical trinkets Choose your way of fighting by creating combinations of spells 50 Levels of increasing difficulty 4 Evil bosses Progress as a mage with 26 grades Survival mode Hours of challenging gameplay
Meta Title: Ultimagus: Feb 10, 2017, Zealwind and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Ultimagus? Check out the release date (Feb 10, 2017), developer insights from Zealwind, and a complete game summary.
